articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Zimbabwe
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Zimbabwe with long historical traditions would grow stronger in all fields.
					
					 It sincerely wished the president good health and happiness and the president, government and people of Zimbabwe greater success in their work for the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to New President of ECOWAS
articles.content:
Congratulations to New President of ECOWAS
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a congratulatory message to Marcel Alain de Souza, new president of the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) on April 15.
					 Wishing the president success in his work for achieving the regional stability and development and the unity of the ECOWAS member nations, the message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the ECOWAS member nations would as ever grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations to Beninese Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation
articles.content:
Congratulations to Beninese Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on April 14 sent a congratulatory message to Aurelien Agbenonci on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Benin.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the Beninese minister great success in his new job for developing the external relations of the country.

articles.title: WPK Congratulates South West Africa People's Organizational Party of Namibia
articles.content:
WPK Congratulates South West Africa People's Organizational Party of Namibia
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Monday sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party of Namibia on the occasion of its 56th founding anniversary.
					 The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the WPK and the South West Africa People's Organizational Party of Namibia would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and sincerely wished the party greater success in its activities to strengthen the party and achieve the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Gennadi Andreyevich Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on April 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, we extend sincere congratulations and the best wishes for fresh success in building the socialist society to you and the Korean people.
					
					 We witness the successes the DPRK has achieved in all fields of the national economy and the development of science, culture and education.
					
					 The successes achieved by your country in bolstering the national defence capability win admiration among the world people.
					
					 The Korean people faithful to the behests of their leaders continue to advance confidently along the road of building the socialist society under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Congratulatory Groups, Delegations of Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Congratulatory Groups, Delegations of Overseas Compatriots
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter on Monday from the members of the congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots who took part in the celebrations the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 In the letter they extended the highest tribute and ever-lasting glory to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the eternal sun of the Korean nation and the peerlessly great men, and warm greetings to Marshal Kim Jong Un, the outstanding leader of the Korean nation, representing the boundless reverence and loyalty of all overseas Koreans.
					
					 The celebration period of the Day of the Sun was the precious days which helped us get deeper understanding of the motherland, the letter said, adding:
					
					 Witnessing eye-opening realities of the motherland, we have keenly realize what great men the Korean nation is holding in high esteem as its leaders and under what outstanding and great leader the Korean people are building   the most powerful country envied by the world, and have drawn fresh strength and courage from them.
					
					 We will firmly protect the compatriots organizations, precious patriotic legacies of the great leaders, and unite broad strata of compatriots close around the organizations and thus boost the solidarity and alliance among regions and wage a dynamic patriotic Mallima movement for making tangible contributions to reunifying the country and building of a rich and powerful nation, keeping pace with the people in the motherland dashing forward at the Mallima speed towards victory and glory in May.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Registered Honorary Chairman of Communist Party of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Registered Honorary Chairman of Communist Party of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was registered honorary chairman of the Communist Party of the DR Congo on his birth anniversary.
					 A relevant decision was adopted at the plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the party on April 10.
					
					 An event took place on April 11 to convey a certificate of the honorary chairman of the party.
					
					 Present at the event were the general secretary of the party, figures of its Central Committee, the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Kinshasa.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the art piece depicting Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 The general secretary of the party conveyed the certificate to the charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK embassy.
					
					 Letters "Communist Party of the DR Congo Membership Card" were written on the upper part of the certificate, the portrait of the smiling peerlessly great man on its center and letters "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung, Honorary Chairman of the Communist Party of the DR Congo" on its lower part.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Tours Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Tours Kimilsungia Festival Venue
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front toured the venues of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chief said after touring the venue:
					
					 Kimilsungia cherished by Koreans and progressive people is the best flower to be specially recorded in the history of world floriculture.
					
					 While seeing the flowers praising the great man in the venue, I felt quite emotional as I could keenly feel the beaming image of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kimilsungia is also blooming in various parts of south Korea, reflecting the reverence of south Koreans for the great President the Korean nation acclaimed and held in high esteem for the first time in its history.
					
					 The flower will be brought into full bloom across the world amid the ever-deep reverence of all people for the great man.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and Koreans from China who participated in the 18th Kimilsungia Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President, they looked round historical relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President who performed exploits for accomplishing the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 They also toured the Rungna Dolphinarium and Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Sariwon
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Sariwon
 Sariwon, April 18 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troup on a performance tour of provincial areas gave a performance in Sariwon.
					 Among the audience were working people and officials in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The performance started with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu".
					
					 In such numbers as female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", female duet "His Humanity" the performers sang highly of the endless pride and confidence of the service personnel and people of the DPRK being blessed by the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 The repertoire included the numbers helping the audience recollect with deep emotion the trust and love showed by the peerlessly great men who brought about a dramatic change in the province through their on-the-spot guidance.
					
					 Folk dance "Let's Be Proud of Our National Costumes" and tap dance "Young Days" were acclaimed by the audience for national feelings, smart rhythm and refined and tested artistic presentation.

articles.title: DPRK Figure Skaters Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Figure Skaters Back Home 
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK figure-skaters Monday came back home after participating in the 2016 ISU World Development Trophy Figure Skating Tournament.
					 They won four gold medals at the tournament.
					
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by officials concerned.
					
					 Sportspersons put garlands around the necks of winners and gave bunches of flowers to them, congratulating their successes.

articles.title: Russian Guests Leave
articles.content:
Russian Guests Leave
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by Nikolay Zubrilin, member of the Bureau of the Committee and deputy to the Moscow City Duma, left here for home Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Kyrgyz Party Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Kyrgyz Party Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Political Party "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan headed by Arslanbek Maliev, leader of the party, left here for home Monday.

articles.title: Italian Guest Leaves
articles.content:
Italian Guest Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, left here for home Monday.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Leave
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans headed by First Vice-Chairman Kim Chil Song who is chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, a delegation of the United Confederation of Koreans in Sakhalin Region, Russia headed by Chairman Ri Ku Yul, a delegation of the Association of Old Men of Korean Nationality in Dandong City, China headed by Vice-Chairman Ri Tok Chol and Kim Kyong Ryol, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia left here Monday.

articles.title: Juche Idea Followers Go Home
articles.content:
Juche Idea Followers Go Home
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand led by Chairman Songchit Pullarp, Gennady Kulikov, chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, and D. Enkhbadralt, member of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes Leave
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign artistes left here for home on Monday after participating in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 They were the State Academic Classic Ballet Group of Russia, the State Academic Voronezh Russian Folk Choir, the State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye" of Russia, the chamber trio-instrumentalist group of the Symphony Orchestra of the Khabarovsk Territory of Russia, the Malaysia Fresco Harmonica Ensemble, the State Band Orchestra of Belarus, the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France, the instrumental trio ensemble of Cuba, the Cyprus musical company, a Peruvian soloist, the head of the Folk Artistic Group Dance Ensemble "Vitaminchyky" of Ukraine, a soloist of the National Opera Theatre of Ukraine, the conductor of the Young Philharmonia Italian Orchestra, the State Art Troup of Vietnam, the Flamenco Band of Spain, the Circus of the Russian State Circus Company, the Circus of the Center for Development of Mongolian Circus, the Belarusian National Circus, the Circus of Vietnam and magicians of Thailand.

articles.title: Nonferrous Ore Production Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Nonferrous Ore Production Goes Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The output of nonferrous minerals is increasing at mines and industrial establishments in the Tanchon area of the DPRK.
					 The area is the nation's major nonferrous ore producer with a world-leading magnesite production base.
					
					 The Komdok Mining Complex in the area has made record high in the production of lead and zinc ores in ten years.
					
					 The Tanchon Smeltery boosted the electrolytic zinc production 1.5 times after the start of the 70-day campaign.
					
					 The Taehung Youth Hero Mine and Ryongyang and Paekbawi mines have daily produced several hundred more tons of magnesite than scheduled.
					
					 Meanwhile, the production of quality light burned magnesia and magnesia clinker went up 1.2 times.

articles.title: University Students Active in Sci-tech Research
articles.content:
University Students Active in Sci-tech Research
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Activities of scientific research groups of university students are growing stronger in the DPRK, according to an official concerned.
					 In recent 50 days alone, they have carried out hundreds of valuable sci-tech subjects through group research, he said, adding: 
					
					 Students of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other universities in Pyongyang solved over 100 sci-tech problems, thus contributing to technical modernization and growth of production at different industrial establishments and cooperative farms.
					
					 Students of Kanggye University of Technology developed a device to speed up turbine, so as to raise its productive efficiency of electric-power over 20 percent.
					
					 Those of Chongjin University of Technology helped boosting the output of iron and steel in the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, while students of other universities in North Hamgyong Province developed scores of technical innovations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Winning Shining Victory in 70-day Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Winning Shining Victory in 70-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- All sectors and units should regard the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as lifeline and dynamically conduct a drive for implementing their behests and party policies and thus win a shining victory in the 70-day campaign, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an editorial.
					 Noting that the behests of the great leaders serve as a textbook of the revolution and all-purpose encyclopedia, the editorial goes on:
					
					 They clearly indicate the goals to be taken by all fields of the revolution and construction as guidelines and ways for attaining them and they serve as a shortcut to accomplishing the great cause of building a thriving nation and realizing the ideal of the people as early as possible.
					
					 The Korean revolution is making a victorious advance the way the great leaders made revolutions and by the methods they struggled and the most powerful country we are building is the nation in which their intentions and wishes are realized.
					
					 The exemplary units taking the lead in the day-and-night advance of the 70-day campaign are carrying out the behests of the great leaders without an inch of deflection and concession.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that doing every work as taught by the great leaders provides the master key to firmly defending our party and revolution and ushering in the greatest heyday for building a thriving nation on the principle of self-development.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the service personnel and people to vigorously turn out in the drive for implementing the behests of the great leaders and glorify their lives as performers of heroic feats and honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty toward the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Park Geun Hye's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye at a "state council meeting" held at Chongwadae on April 12 vociferated about what she called "armed provocation" and "ceaseless and reckless provocations" and cried out for "decisively countering those provocations" of the north.
					 Commenting on her outbursts, Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes:
					
					 No matter how noisily Park may trumpet about "provocations," she can never cover up her despicable true colors as a warmonger hell-bent on provocations and moves for a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 What Park Geun Hye uttered is, in fact, nothing but a poor grumbling made by the wicked boss of Chongwadae going reckless, fear-stricken by the might of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The confrontation policy of the U.S. and the Park group towards the DPRK is now going bust in face of the invincible might of the DPRK being strikingly demonstrated with each passing day. Finding herself in extreme horror and despair with the hour of her doom drawing nearer, she is busy reeling off a spate of hackneyed confrontation jargons every day before mandarins, kept in Chongwadae like a pheasant scared by an eagle.
					
					 But Park had better be well aware that she may lose her slender neck for recklessly wagging her tongue as now.
					
					 She would be well advised to behave herself, bearing in mind that her rash acts would only invite retaliation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nationwide Struggle to Achieve Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nationwide Struggle to Achieve Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 18th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					 Kim Jong Il sent a letter to the national seminar for marking the 50th anniversary of the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea on April 18, Juche 87 (1998). In the letter he clarified the five-point policy for the great national unity by preserving and steadily carrying forward the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, experience gained by him and the tradition established by him in achieving the great national unity.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The five-point policy for the great national unity clarifies that the great national unity should be strictly based on the principle of national independence, get united under the banner of patriotism and national reunification, improve the inter-Korean relations, oppose domination and interference of outside forces and struggle against the traitors to the nation, the lackeys of outside forces, and calls on all Koreans to visit each other, promote contact and dialogue and boost solidarity and alliance.  This policy serves as immortal guidelines fully meeting the realistic requirements of the movement for Korea's reunification which has entered a new historic stage.
					
					 The fundamental principle of Korea's reunification indicated by the President and Kim Jong Il remains unchanged, no matter how the situation, conditions and circumstances may change.
					
					 Now is the time for all Koreans at home and abroad to intensify the nation-wide struggle to thoroughly foil the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, in hearty response to the idea and line of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on the great national unity.
					
					 Difficulties and obstacles are still lying in the way of achieving the country's reunification, but no one can block the struggle of the Koreans to usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Closure of U.S. Forces' Shooting Range
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Closure of U.S. Forces' Shooting Range
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- More than 300 south Korean residents near the shooting range of the U.S. forces in Phochon City, Kyonggi Province held a meeting in the Changsu-myon area of the city in protest against the drill for a war against the north, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on April 16.
					 They deplored that residents in Phochon are seized with uneasiness due to noise and danger of bullets and shells frequently flying into the village during day and night firing drills.
					
					 Nevertheless, the "government" and the U.S. forces side do not take security measures, they protested, expressing the will to launch an action for the closure of the shooting range.
					
					 They demanded the authorities guarantee security of the residents in Phochon and compensate for the damage.

articles.title: Korean Media Man in U.S. on Defeat of Park Geun Hye Forces in "National Assembly" Election
articles.content:
Korean Media Man in U.S. on Defeat of Park Geun Hye Forces in "National Assembly" Election 
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An article posted on Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., commented on the ruling "Saenuri Party's" heavy defeat in the "National Assembly" election in south Korea. It was contributed by Son Se Yong, member of its editorial board.
					 Public sentiments critical of the Park Geun Hye forces were manifested in the election, the article noted, adding:
					
					 If the ruling "Saenuri Party" persists in its arrogant behavior, the present regime will not be able to serve the full term of its office.
					
					 Park and the ruling party should roll back their treacherous policies characterized by illegal suppression, irregularities and corruption, submission to the U.S. and confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 They should neither accuse the compatriots in the north nor solicit pressure upon them, touring foreign countries, but take the road of achieving national independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Calls for Struggle against U.S. and Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Calls for Struggle against U.S. and Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an article on April 14 said that the people's mindset sternly judged Park Geun Hye through the April 13 general election.
					 The article said the present "government" has become a "vegetable-like government" as its ruling power has been paralyzed in the closing period of its office and the "Saenuri Party" suffered a heavy blow.
					
					 Noting that progress in the present era is independent reunification and democracy, the article said that there should be political forces encouraging the people to wage a struggle against the U.S. and Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on April 13 in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					 Upon authorization of the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace and chairman of the Cambodian preparatory committee for the Day of the Sun, laid the large floral baskets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Russian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung from March 31 to April 5.
					 Khabarovski Express edited an article titled "Iron-willed commander" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It said:
					
					 It is the unprecedented miracle that the DPRK won victory in the past Korean war by smashing the aggression of the U.S., which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and its followers. This goes to the credit of Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea.
					
					 Clark who was the then commander of the "UN Forces" confessed that the army of North Korea registered success thanks to the competent commandership of General Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Officials of the Pentagon and the U.S. Department of State lauded Kim Il Sung as the outstanding great man and master of military affairs.
					
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda allotted one whole page to an article titled "Eternal sun" accompanied with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and his photos.
					
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda Vladivostok carried an article titled "A model internationalist" illustrated with photos dealing with Kim Il Sung's external activities.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Congo
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung released special bulletin on April 9.
					 The bulletin in an article said that the world progressives significantly celebrate the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, as a holiday common to humankind.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The human history records many great men but it knows no such great man as Kim Il Sung who has been praised and revered by all people for decades.
					
					 He was an outstanding veteran statesman in the world as he led the cause of human independence to victory under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism all his life.
					
					 In the rigorous period when the socialist cause witnessed frustration and turns and twists in some countries he held aloft the banner of socialism and encouraged the progressives to invariably take the road of independence.
					
					 He, the genuine internationalist, let the Korean revolutionaries sincerely help the Chinese revolution and defend the Soviet Union with arms during the period of the anti-Japanese struggle and, thereafter, rendered active support to the revolutionary struggle of the Cuban people and the anti-U.S. struggle of the Vietnamese people.
					
					 He also indicated the orientation and way of strengthening the non-aligned movement.
					
					 He set forth strategies and tactics for the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism in every period of the development of history and energetically led the cause of human independence to advance along its orbit without an inch of deflection under the complicated situation.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Feats Lauded by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Feats Lauded by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 5 in celebration of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and state of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 He wisely led the party and state for the past four years, triumphantly advancing the building of a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK.
					
					 In this course fresh miracles have been made one after another in the DPRK.
					
					 It fully demonstrated its might as a politico-ideological power and a military power and registered shining achievements in economic construction under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He is successfully carrying forward the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He showed the whole world the truth that active attack, not passive defense is needed to win a victory in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Under his outstanding Songun leadership the service personnel and people of the DPRK foiled the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and defended peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Korea will surely be reunified and the future of reunified Korea will be rosy thanks to him.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Guinea, Niger and Finland from March 18 to 30 to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The battalion commander of a commando of the Guinean Ministry of Defence in a lecture titled "Eternal sun" said:
					
					 The august name of the President means the sun.
					
					 He illuminated the road for humankind to follow just as his august name implies the sun, created a flower garden for the people with his warm loving care and embraced all people with great attraction.
					
					 Regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, he dedicated his all to them.
					
					 He provided the DPRK with a grand flower garden of humanity in which all people help and lead each other forward.
					
					 The head of the financial department of a general company of Niger in a lecture titled "Whole life of believing in people as in Heaven" said that the whole life of Kim Il Sung was associated with love and devotion to the people.
					
					 It is by no means accidental that the Korean people are determined to hold him in high esteem as their eternal leader and father for all ages, the head noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Bulgarian Newspaper Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Bulgarian Newspaper Introduces DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian newspaper Duma on April 4 carried articles introducing the DPRK under the headline "Land of morning calm" illustrated with the panoramic pictures of Mirae Scientists Street, the Sci-Tech Complex, Changjon Street and other monumental buildings.
					 Korea with time-honored history spanning 5 000 years was divided into the north and the south by outsiders after the Second World War and the DPRK people won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War ignited by the U.S. imperialists, it said, and went on:
					
					 The diligent, strong-willed and peace-loving Korean people have built an industrialized socialist state on the ruins of the war under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Popular policies such as free education system and free medical care system are being enforced in the DPRK.
					
					 The people of the DPRK have made great achievements in all fabrics of society.
					
					 Many monumental edifices have been built in Pyongyang, capital of the DPRK, under the wise guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and all the conditions are provided for the people to lead a civilized life under socialism.
					
					 Dozens of years have passed since the ceasefire on the Korean peninsula but durable peace has not yet been ensured.
					
					 Danger of unpredictable crisis is increasing on the peninsula due to the U.S. and south Korea's ceaseless military provocations.
					
					 This indicates that the existing truce can not guarantee the peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK advanced proposals of replacing the armistice agreement with a peace treaty to establish durable peace mechanism on the peninsula on several occasions. 
					
					 The people of the DPRK desire after the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Parties, Organizations Show Solidarity with DPRK
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Parties, Organizations Show Solidarity with DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting with the Korean people took place in Dakha, Bangladesh on April 4 in support of the appeal of the 20th seminar of the world political parties on building a new society.
					 Present at the meeting were Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, Khaleq Zaman Bhuiyan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, personages of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee and other Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and masses.
					
					 The appeal adopted at the 20th seminar of the world political parties on building a new society was read out and speeches were made by the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and others.
					
					 They said the appeal reflected the solidarity of the progressive parties and people of Bangladesh with the DPRK triumphantly advancing the cause of independence against imperialism, extending full support to the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK for defending the national sovereignty and peace and achieving national reunification. 
					
					 A solidarity statement was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 36o aniversario de independencia de Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nationwide Struggle to Achieve Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 18th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					 Kim Jong Il sent a letter to the national seminar for marking the 50th anniversary of the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea on April 18, Juche 87 (1998). In the letter he clarified the five-point policy for the great national unity by preserving and steadily carrying forward the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, experience gained by him and the tradition established by him in achieving the great national unity.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The five-point policy for the great national unity clarifies that the great national unity should be strictly based on the principle of national independence, get united under the banner of patriotism and national reunification, improve the inter-Korean relations, oppose domination and interference of outside forces and struggle against the traitors to the nation, the lackeys of outside forces, and calls on all Koreans to visit each other, promote contact and dialogue and boost solidarity and alliance.  This policy serves as immortal guidelines fully meeting the realistic requirements of the movement for Korea's reunification which has entered a new historic stage.
					
					 The fundamental principle of Korea's reunification indicated by the President and Kim Jong Il remains unchanged, no matter how the situation, conditions and circumstances may change.
					
					 Now is the time for all Koreans at home and abroad to intensify the nation-wide struggle to thoroughly foil the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, in hearty response to the idea and line of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on the great national unity.
					
					 Difficulties and obstacles are still lying in the way of achieving the country's reunification, but no one can block the struggle of the Koreans to usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente de CC de PCFR
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and Koreans from China who participated in the 18th Kimilsungia Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President, they looked round historical relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President who performed exploits for accomplishing the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 They also toured the Rungna Dolphinarium and Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: Otorgado a Kim Il Sung titulo de presidente honorario en Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Feats Lauded by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 5 in celebration of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and state of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 He wisely led the party and state for the past four years, triumphantly advancing the building of a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK.
					
					 In this course fresh miracles have been made one after another in the DPRK.
					
					 It fully demonstrated its might as a politico-ideological power and a military power and registered shining achievements in economic construction under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He is successfully carrying forward the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He showed the whole world the truth that active attack, not passive defense is needed to win a victory in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Under his outstanding Songun leadership the service personnel and people of the DPRK foiled the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and defended peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Korea will surely be reunified and the future of reunified Korea will be rosy thanks to him.
